title: The Burning Bush
summary: Exodus 3 describes how God appears to Moses in a burning bush on Mount Horeb and calls him to deliver Israel from Egypt. God reveals His name, 'I AM WHO I AM,' and promises to be with Moses.

faq.question: What did God tell Moses at the burning bush?
faq.answer: That He had seen Israelâ€™s suffering and was sending Moses to deliver them from Egypt.

faq.question: What name did God reveal to Moses?
faq.answer: God said, 'I AM WHO I AM' (Yahweh).
